title: On the radio… again
author: VD
content_html: Just got an invite from the Fraters Libertas, and I’ll be on the Northern Alliance Radio Show at AM 1280 in the Twi Cities on Saturday at 2 o’clock. It should be an interesting show, as Joe Carter from the Evangelical Outpost will be on as well for a last hurrah before heading out to Saudi Arabia. The topic will likely be Abu Ghraib, as Joe was one of the first people to point out that the reservist factor was a strong element in the prison scandal.
content_text: Just got an invite from the Fraters Libertas, and I’ll be on the Northern Alliance Radio Show at AM 1280 in the Twi Cities on Saturday at 2 o’clock.  It should be an interesting show, as Joe Carter from the Evangelical Outpost will be on as well for a last hurrah before heading out to Saudi Arabia.  The topic will likely be Abu Ghraib, as Joe was one of the first people to point out that the reservist factor was a strong element in the prison scandal.
